about.title: About lnk.day
about.subtitle: Empowering connections in the digital world

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe every link is an opportunity to connect, engage, and grow. Our mission is to provide the tools that make those connections meaningful and measurable.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2024, lnk.day was born from a simple idea: link management should be powerful yet simple. Today, we serve millions of users worldwide, from individual creators to Fortune 500 companies.

items.title: Simplicity
items.description: We make complex things simple and accessible to everyone

items.title: Reliability
items.description: Your links work when you need them, every single time

items.title: Privacy
items.description: We respect your data and never sell your information

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We continuously improve to stay ahead of your needs

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.description: Have a question, feedback, or need help? Our team is here to assist you.
contact.success: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our services.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access or disclosure.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us at privacy@lnk.day to exercise these rights.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using lnk.day, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Use of Services
sections.content: You may use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You agree not to use our services for spam, malware, or any illegal activities.

sections.title: Account Responsibilities
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: Our services and their contents are protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, lnk.day shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include core features.

sections.title: What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide a better experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing site usage.

sections.title: Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality, analytics cookies to understand usage patterns, and preference cookies to remember your settings.

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: We may use third-party services like analytics providers that set their own cookies. These are governed by their respective privacy policies.

footer.description: The complete link management platform for modern businesses.
